The **calfsbm** package aims to provide user-friendly functions to implement 
the covariate-assisted latent factor stochastic block model for community detection
problems in networks.

## Installation

You can install the **calfsbm"" package from GitHub with:

```{r install, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sydneylouit539/calfsbm")
```
